text: The Rudolf Virchow Monument () is an outdoor monument to Rudolf Virchow, who was a pathologist, archaeologist, politician and public-health reformer. The monument was created by Fritz Klimsch from 1906 to 1910, and is located on Karlplatz in Berlin-Mitte, Germany.http://himetop.wikidot.com/rudolf-virchow- monument October 21, 2018. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1910 establishments in Germany Category:1910 sculptures Category:Mitte Category:Monuments and memorials in Berlin Category:Outdoor sculptures in Berlin Category:Rudolf Virchow Category:Sculptures of men in Germany Category:Statues in Germany
